meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Annemarie Brentrup Genaro Lopez Lyn Thomas Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6056.

td.p: Annemarie Brentrup, a pizza restaurant manager originally from Bismarck, North Dakota
Genaro Lopez, a contract administrator from Portland, Oregon
Lyn Thomas, a library assistant from Redmond, Washington (whose 1-day cash winnings total $13,100)

tr.td: NOVEL IDEAS
21st CENTURY ATHLETES
SKY HIGH
(Alex: We want you to name the city as we deal with [*]. We'll tell you about the skyscrapers.)
SCENTSATIONAL!
TECHNOLOGY OF THE PAST
"EAU" K
